titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution expresses the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of actress Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday, her iconic status, and lasting contributions to international cinema, global fashion, and humanitarian causes.
